channel.title: New web site and some fresh air from bel asteroid
channel.description:
Since last news, the website have gained a weak Ai playing Mario and 2 important videos to summarize our efforts...
https://www.dropbox.com/s/w8rc8mcjs9iq875/Screenshot%202015-12-09%2009.37.58.png?dl=0
Also, just today, I've been writing about "a movie to rule them all":
/talk/t/when-is-10-not-enough-little-prince/7772
If you haven't watched it, do yourself a favor. You may even get disappointed at first, you may not see why that's related to basiux... Well, try again. Keep trying.
<details><summary>Spoiler about what's basiux about.</summary> Above all, about spreading the love. :heart: </details>
Other than that, it really teaches us nothing about neural networks, genetic algorithm or Ai, I think. But the main concepts we need to build into basiux are all there. This is, actually, very relevant.

item.title: New web site and some fresh air from bel asteroid
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Maybe a "small" update continuation from this is the rebranding of our meet up group. It's now:

basiux's Church of Tech in Lisbon

I also can't explain much about it right now, but think Church of Bacon or Pastafarianism, except our "God" is basiux (in lack of a better name for now).

Read full topic
item.source: New web site and some fresh air from bel asteroid

item.title: New web site and some fresh air from bel asteroid
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Since last news, the website have gained a weak Ai playing Mario and 2 important videos to summarize our efforts...

Also, just today, I've been writing about "a movie to rule them all":

When is 10 not enough, little prince? spoilers
This is the first time she sees him: [image] I didn't want to watch this movie last night. I wanted Ex Machina (because everyone asks me about it, dreadful science fiction) or The Martian. I wanted science. My wife wanted to go out. I invited her, she said it was too late and asked me "let's watch a flick". Yay! I love films! I gave up on trying to convince her to go out, as I know she loves it more than watching any screen, and was I hopeful. "22:00, there should be enough time today", I thoâ€¦

If you haven't watched it, do yourself a favor. You may even get disappointed at first, you may not see why that's related to basiux... Well, try again. Keep trying.

Spoiler about what's basiux about.

Above all, about spreading the love.

Other than that, it really teaches us nothing about neural networks, genetic algorithm or Ai, I think. But the main concepts we need to build into basiux are all there. This is, actually, very relevant.

Read full topic
item.source: New web site and some fresh air from bel asteroid
